thread.title: AIIMS Recruitment 2017 – 320 Teaching & Non Teaching Posts
thread.title_full: AIIMS Recruitment 2017 – 320 Teaching & Non Teaching Posts

author: publisher12
title: AIIMS Recruitment 2017 – 320 Teaching & Non Teaching Posts
text: 1. Senior Resident: 10 Posts 2. Junior Resident: 09 Posts Age Limit: Candidates upper age should be 43 years for Post 1 & 40 years for Post 2 as on 10-03-2017. Age relaxation 5 years is applicable to SC/ ST & 3 years for OBC candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess a postgraduate medical degree viz. MD/ MS/ DNB in the respective discipline from a recognized university/ Institution for medical candidates & M.Sc degree in the subject concerned and Ph.D in the subject concerned/ allied subject from a recognized University/ Institute for non-medical candidates (only for Department of Anatomy, Biochemistry & Pharmacology) for Post 1 & should have passed MBBS (including Completion of Internship) or equivalent degree recognized by MCI for Post 2. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.aiimsrishikesh.edu.in from 11-02-2017 at 10.00 AM to 10-03-2017 by 05.00 PM. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying to the online candidates should have a valid mail id and password. 2. Log onto the website www.aiimsrishikesh.edu.in 3. Click on Recruitments. 4. select the desired post and click on Online Application. 5. Fill all the mandatory details carefully and submit the form. 6. Take the printout copy for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date for Online Application: 11-02-2017 at 10.00 AM. Last Date for Online Application: 10-03-2017 by 05.00 PM. For more details like tenure, remuneration, expiry of appointment & other information click on the link given below…. Click here to Apply Online AIIMS Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Staff Nurse Posts: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Raipur has issued a notification for Special Drive for the recruitment of PwD persons of Staff Nurse Grade-II (ST) (Backlog vacancy) vacancies on direct recruitment basis. Eligible candidates can apply online from 02-02-2017 by 11.00 AM to 03-03-2017 by 05.00 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… AIIMS Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Staff Nurse Grade-II (Sister Grade – II) (Backlog vacancy) Age Limit: Candidates upper age should be 45 years (including age relaxation for PwD (ST) candidates) as on the last date of receipt of application. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess B.Sc (Nursing) (4 year course) from a recognized Institute/ University or B.Sc (Post-certificate) or equivalent such as B.Sc. Nursing (Post-basic) (2 year course) from a recognised institute/ university, registered with the Indian Nursing Council/ State Nursing Council. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written examination. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.aiimsraipur.edu.in from 02-02-2017 by 11.00 AM to 03-03-2017 by 05.00 PM & send the hard copy of application along with self attested copies of all relevant certificates as mentioned in the notification, envelope should be superscribed with “Application for the post of Staff Nurse Grade-II (PwD candidates)” by Speed post/ Registered Post to Sr. Administrative Officer, AIIMS, Tatibandh, Raipur (C.G.) Pin-492099 within 07 days from the last date of application. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid e-mail id, contact no & scanned copies of all relevant certificates & photograph. 2. Log on to www.aiimsraipur.edu.in 3. Click on “Vacancies”. 4. Select the desired post & Click on “Apply Online”. 5. Fill the details carefully & submit the form. 6. Take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date for Online Application: 02-02-2017 by 11.00 AM. Last Date for Online Application: 03-03-2017 by 05.00 PM. Last Date for Submission of Hard copy of Application: within 07 days from the last date of application. For more details like desirable qualification, pay band & other information click on the link given below…. Eligible candidates can walk in interview on 08-03-2017 at 10.00 AM. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… AIIMS Vacancy Details:
